casebody.data:
Anthony T. WATSON, petitioner,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A. No. 15-8361. Supreme Court of the United States April 25, 2016.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until May 16, 2016, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
